duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and lead comprehensive sales strategies to acquire new clients and drive revenue growth in the B2B sector.
Build and maintain strong client relationships, identifying opportunities, and driving sales through effective communication and negotiation.
Prioritize and manage multiple touch points with clients, maximizing opportunities and ensuring follow-through on all sales activities.
Network and engage in face-to-face interactions to expand the client portfolio and promote products and services.
Utilize CRM platform to streamline client acquisition and maintain a robust sales pipeline.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
